summary: SummaryMedicube Zero Pore Tightening Padâ€”facial toner pads infused with Salicylic Acid(BHA)+ AHA + Patented pore care ingredients to help exfoliate dead skin cells, clear sebum and oil, and minimize the look of pores.
details: DetailsBenefitsDramatically reduces the look of streched poresHelps reduce clogged poresHelps reveal visibly clearer and smoother skinFeaturesDual-textured pads for exfoliating and pore-tighteningEffecitve exfoliating Acids: 4.5% AHA (Lactic Acid) and 0.45% BHA (Salicylic Acid)Suitable for all skin types, proven to be low-irritatingResearch Results11 different self tests completed to confirm skin improvement effectsSebum/Oil decreased by 47.1%Pore Waste decreased by 87.3%Dead Skin Volume improved by 18.0%Blackhead(Whitehead) improved by 44.3%Skin Texture improved by 4.0%Surface Moisture increased by 15.3%Deep Moisture increased by 3.6%Makeup Adhesion showed 1126px difference*Excerpt from Medicube Zero Pore Pads 2.0 test report *Results may vary.Item 2645351How To UseAfter cleansing, with the embossed side, gently swipe across the face from the center outwards.With the silky side, gently swipe your face one more time for a final polishing touchLightly pat to absorbFor external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Not to be used for children under three years of age.*Read instructions and caution before use.Sunburn Alert! This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear sun protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.IngredientsWater, Methylpropanediol, Trometamin, Lactic Acid, Alcohol Denat., 1,2-Hexanediol, Panthenol, Glycereth-26, Salicylic Acid, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP, Copolymer, Betaine, Trehalose, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Allantoin, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Disodium EDTA, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Betaine Salicylate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Ethyl Hexanediol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Slix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Origanum Vulgare Leaf Extract, Chamaecyparis Obtusa Leaf Extract, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Cinnamomum Cassia Bark Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Limonene.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing, with the embossed side, gently swipe across the face from the center outwards.With the silky side, gently swipe your face one more time for a final polishing touchLightly pat to absorbFor external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Not to be used for children under three years of age.*Read instructions and caution before use.Sunburn Alert! This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear sun protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

reviews.headline: The hype is right, this is awesome!
reviews.comments: I love these zero pore pads and use them twice a day.  I was a little worried they would be too harsh with my other products, especially because I use an active retinol, but this has made a wonderful addition to my skin routine.  These make my skin smoother and are not drying at all.  I'm in my 40s and these also help my teenagers skin as well.  Great product!

reviews.headline: This is part of my skin care regimen
reviews.comments: I will always use this alongside of all of the other medicube products. I love how it makes my skin look and feel. And I've gotten so many compliments on my skin since I've started using the medicube brand.

reviews.headline: Wow.
reviews.comments: Ive never had a product clear my skin and minimize my pores like this before. And SO. QUICKLY. The way it cleans white and blackheads from the sides and top of my nose is unreal. And its not even abrasive, doesnt sting, or irritate my skin. Thabk you medicube. Please dont change or get rid of this product!

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin ! but i could never find an exfoliating pad that wouldn't break me out. THIS DID NOT ! if anything my skin became more radiant , clear and smooth. I'm in love with this product!

reviews.headline: Hard pass
reviews.comments: Left my skin sticky i will be retuning also broke my face out bad and made my pores look huge

reviews.headline: Great for maintenance for oily acne prone skin
reviews.comments: I love thsi product so much have purchased 4 different times it helps prevent my breakout since i have been using this product i break put a lot atound my forehead due to how ouly it gets so glad its now in ulta i do t have to woat fir it to ship anymore

reviews.headline: Pores?  Where?  Texture?  Gone!
reviews.comments: Im obsessed with these.  Changed my texture for the better.  I use daily before makeup application to exfoiliate.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: Completeky changed the texture of my skin. I LOVE THESE

reviews.headline: you need this
reviews.comments: I truly cannot live without this. I bought it three times, before it even arrived to Ulta. Now that it's here, I'll be good for life.

reviews.headline: Been using this product before it released to Ulta
reviews.comments: I loveeee these Medicube pads! When I first started using them it helped unclog my pores and significantly reduced them in size only after using it for about a week. So far ive repurchased these pads twice and will continue to do so!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I love these so much I just re ordered them!!

reviews.headline: I will forever buy over and over!
reviews.comments: I love these! They do everything for me!! I recommend these to everyone always! They helped clear my pigmentation , black heads , white heads and help with break outs too! My skin loves these! I have bought 4 times!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: These helped clear up the clogged pores on my forehead within a couple of days!

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: i love this product so much, i saw improvemnet after only a few days! it feel so good on the skin too!

reviews.headline: Don't do what's promised
reviews.comments: These really don't do whats promised (for me). They may clear oil but they dont control it. If anything, I'm left sticky and more oily throughout the day. Love the packaging and the price, but I absolutely wouldn't repurchase.

faceoff_positive.comments: I love these zero pore pads and use them twice a day.  I was a little worried they would be too harsh with my other products, especially because I use an active retinol, but this has made a wonderful addition to my skin routine.  These make my skin smoother and are not drying at all.  I'm in my 40s and these also help my teenagers skin as well.  Great product!
faceoff_positive.headline: The hype is right, this is awesome!

faceoff_negative.comments: These really don't do whats promised (for me). They may clear oil but they dont control it. If anything, I'm left sticky and more oily throughout the day. Love the packaging and the price, but I absolutely wouldn't repurchase.
